docstring.long_description:
If the bandwidths are set to 0, the bandwidths will be automatic.

Requires a CONNECTION_FSV node at the start of the app to connect with
the instrument. The VISA address will then be listed under 'connection'.

This node should also work with compatible R&S network analyzers.
docstring.short_description: The BANDWIDTH_FSV block sets the bandwidths for the signal analyzer.

parameters.name: connection
parameters.description: The VISA address (requires the CONNECTION_FSV node).

parameters.name: resolution_bandwidth
parameters.description: Resolution bandwidth, in Hz. Set to automatic if equal to 0.

parameters.name: video_bandwidth
parameters.description: Video bandwidth, in Hz. Set to automatic if equal to 0.

videos.title: Read FM Radio Signals using Flojoy
